name: Board Trivia
description:
A board-like quiz game meant to educate and entertain all ages.

It was built with the LÖVE framework version 11.2. https://love2d.org/ You have access to the text, images, and sound to mod it. Add and delete content to your heart's delight.

Controls
  • Menu - Up, Down, Enter keys
  • Start Dice Roll - Up key
  • Stop Dice Roll - Down key
